statements: SELECT * FROM community_consultations;
SELECT consultation_id, theme, participant_name FROM community_consultations;
SELECT * FROM community_consultations WHERE theme = 'Education';
SELECT * FROM community_consultations WHERE participant_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT consultation_id, feedback FROM community_consultations ORDER BY feedback DESC;
SELECT * FROM community_consultations WHERE theme = 'Education'
SELECT consultation_id, feedback FROM community_consultations WHERE participant_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT * FROM community_consultations ORDER BY theme DESC
SELECT DISTINCT theme FROM community_consultations
SELECT participant_name, participant_contact FROM community_consultations WHERE theme LIKE '%Health%'
SELECT * FROM consultations;
SELECT participant_name, consultation_date FROM consultations;
SELECT id, feedback FROM consultations WHERE feedback IS NOT NULL;
SELECT consultation_id, concern_description FROM ethical_concerns ORDER BY consultation_id DESC;
SELECT participant_name, feedback, consultation_date FROM consultations WHERE consultation_date > '2022-05-01';
SELECT * FROM consultations WHERE participant_name = 'Alice';
SELECT feedback, consultation_date FROM consultations WHERE consultation_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY consultation_date DESC;
SELECT participant_name, feedback FROM consultations LEFT JOIN ethical_concerns ON consultations.id = ethical_concerns.consultation_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_concerns FROM ethical_concerns;
SELECT participant_name, feedback AS comments FROM consultations WHERE participant_name = 'Bob' ORDER BY consultation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT id, participant_name, feedback_text, rating, submitted_at FROM feedback WHERE rating = 5;
SELECT topic, location, start_date FROM community_consultations ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT organizer, COUNT(*) as total_consultations FROM community_consultations GROUP BY organizer;
SELECT c.topic, e.concern FROM community_consultations c JOIN ethical_concerns e ON c.id = e.consultation_id WHERE e.resolved = false;
SELECT * FROM community_consultations ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT id, topic, organizer FROM community_consultations WHERE organizer = 'John Doe';
SELECT MAX(rating), COUNT(*) FROM feedback GROUP BY consultation_id;
SELECT concern, description FROM ethical_concerns WHERE resolved = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM community_consultations WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM community_consultations;
SELECT consultation_id, consultation_topic, consultation_date FROM community_consultations WHERE location='Main Hall';
SELECT consultation_id, consultation_topic, location FROM community_consultations WHERE consultation_date='2022-10-25';
SELECT organizer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_consultations FROM community_consultations GROUP BY organizer_id;
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM participants WHERE consultation_id=3;
SELECT * FROM community_consultations ORDER BY consultation_date DESC, consultation_id ASC
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM participants WHERE consultation_id = 3
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE concern_id = 2 AND participant_id = 1
SELECT consultation_topic, location FROM community_consultations WHERE organizer_id = 5
SELECT * FROM ethical_concerns JOIN community_consultations ON ethical_concerns.consultation_id = community_consultations.consultation_id
SELECT * FROM consultations;
SELECT id, topic, consultation_date FROM consultations WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT full_name, email FROM participants WHERE organization = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT consultation_id, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE participant_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT ar_tool, impl_id FROM ar_implementation WHERE concern_id = '333e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY ar_tool DESC;
SELECT * FROM consultations;
SELECT consultation_date, location FROM consultations ORDER BY consultation_date DESC;
SELECT full_name, email, organization FROM participants WHERE organization = 'XYZ Corp';
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedback INNER JOIN consultations ON feedback.consultation_id = consultations.id;
SELECT ar_tool, concern_description, relevance_rating FROM ar_implementation INNER JOIN ethical_concerns ON ar_implementation.concern_id = ethical_concerns.concern_id ORDER BY relevance_rating DESC;
